content.raw: Estructura  137 TEACHING OPTIONSEXPANSION 137Los pasatiempos ciento treinta y siete The verbs ver and or  The verb ver to see has an irregular yo form The other forms of ver are regular  The verb or to hear has an irregular yo form and the spelling change iy in the t  ustedlella and ustedesellosellas forms The nosotrosas and vosotrosas  forms have an accent mark  While most commonly translated as to hear or is also used in contexts where English  would use to listen Oigo a unas personas en la otra sala Oyes la radio por la maana I hear some people in the other room Do you listen to the radio in the morning Provide the appropriate forms of these verbs 1 salir 2 ver 3 poner 4 hacer 5 or 6 traer 7 suponer Isabel  Yo  Rita y yo  Yo  l  Ellas  Yo  Nosotros  Uds  Yo  T  Nosotros  Yo  Mi amigo  Yo  T  Los nios  Ud  Yo  T  Nosotras  sale  Salir para is used to indicate someones destination Maana salgo para Mxico Hoy salen para Espaa Tomorrow I leave for Mexico Today they leave for Spain  Salir con means to leave with someone or something or to date someone Alberto sale con su mochila Margarita sale con Guillermo Alberto is leaving with his backpack Margarita is going out with Guillermo Singular forms  yo veo  t ves  Udlella ve Plural forms  nosotrosas vemos  vosotrosas veis  Udsellosellas ven Singular forms  yo oigo  t oyes  Udlella oye Plural forms  nosotrosas omos  vosotrosas os  Udsellosellas oyen The verb ver to see The verb or to hear INTNTALO Tutorial recursos p 128 pp 4546 pp 5960 vhlcentral veo ponemos hago oye traen supongo salimos ven pongo haces omos traigo supone salgo ves ponen hace oigo traes suponemos 136 Leccin 4ciento treinta y seis 44 Verbs with irregular yo forms In Spanish several verbs have irregular yo forms in the present tense  You have already seen three verbs with the go ending in the yo form   hacer poner   salir  suponer traer  to do  to put  to leave to suppose to bring  to make to place  hago pongo salgo supongo traigo  haces pones sales supones traes  hace pone sale supone trae  hacemos ponemos salimos suponemos traemos  hacis ponis sals suponis trais  hacen ponen salen suponen traen S I N G U L A R  F O R M S P L U R A L  F O R M S decir  digo tener  tengo and venir  vengo   Here are some common expressions with decir decir la verdad decir mentiras to tell the truth to tell lies decir que decir la respuesta to say that to say the answer  The verb hacer is often used to ask questions about what someone does Note that  when answering hacer is frequently replaced with another more specific action verb  Poner can also mean to turn on a household appliance Carlos pone la radio Mara pone la televisin Carlos turns on the radio Mara turns on the television  Salir de is used to indicate that someone is leaving a particular place Hoy salgo del hospital Sale de la clase a las cuatro Today I leave the hospital He leaves class at four Salgo mucho los fi nes  de semana Yo no salgo yo hago  la tarea y veo pelculas  en la televisin Verbs with irregular yo forms ANTE TODO Teaching Tips  Point out that or is irregular   in all forms Write a model  sentence on the board   Ex Ustedes oyen el programa  de radio todos los viernes  Then change the subject  and have students give the  new sentence Ex t T oyes  el programa de radio todos   los viernes  Call out different forms of  the verbs in Estructura 44  and have volunteers say the  infinitive Ex oyen or Keep  a brisk pace  Do a chain drill Start by  writing Qu haces los  sbados on the board  Model an appropriate  answer such as Salgo con  mis amigos Ask one student  to respond Ex Veo una  pelcula The next student  you call on should repeat  what the first said and add  on Ex Cindy ve una pelcula  y yo salgo con Continue  until the chain becomes too  long then start with a new  question Keep a brisk pace  Write these phrases on the  board ver la tele traer un  sndwich a la escuela salir  con amigos and hacer yoga  Model the question and  possible answers for each  phrase Then elicit follow up questions Ex Dnde  ves la tele Have student  pairs take turns asking and  answering the questions  They should be prepared  to report to the class about  their partners habits  Explain to students that  the i  y spelling change  strengthens the i sound  between vowels which  helps the ear identify that   the verb is or  Explain the difference  between escuchar to listen  and or to hear  Ex Escucho  la radio No oigo el perro Extra Practice Add an auditory aspect to this grammar  presentation Call out subject pronouns and titles of songs or   movies Ex ustedes Gravedad Have students respond   with a complete sentence using ver or or Ex Ustedes ven   Gravedad Pairs Have pairs use the lesson vocabulary to create questions
